title: LOL I WAS BANNED FOR THIS?
body:
SO RIOT GAVE ME A 14-DAY SUSPENSION FOR JUST THIS?! LOL GOT SOME REAL SJW WARRIOR KIDS WORKING THERE NOW. I DIDN'T USE ANY TRIGGER WORDS OR SWEARING AND YET THEY SUSPENDED MY ACCOUNT LMAO. I HAVE 2 OTHERS YOU AINT STOPPING ME. HOW IS THIS EVEN BANNABLE? NOT EVEN A WARNING. DIDN'T EVEN SAY THE "N" WORD THIS TIME.
